content:
@Grahame Grieve - you mentioned in announcements that there would be a short v2->FHIR mapping session Tuesday evening. When and where is this happening?

https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179240-Announcements/topic/FHIR.20WGM.20Agenda/near/164989433

when: after Corepoint drinks - about 8pm typically but flexible.
where: salon 1
moved to Salon 8, if anyone is looking for us
